#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;

int main(){

	int T , i , j;
	string s ;
	bool valid ;
	char temp ;
	scanf("%d",&T) ;
	while(T--){
	
		valid = true ;
		cin >> s ;

		for(i=0;i<s.length();i++){
		
			if(s[i] == '0'|| s[i] == '1' || s[i] == '8') ;
			else if( s[i] == '6' ) s[i] = '9' ;
			else if( s[i] == '9' ) s[i] = '6' ;
			else{
			
				valid = false ;
				break ;
			}
		
		}
	
		if( ! valid )
			printf("NO\n") ;
		else{
		
			printf("YES\n") ;
			for( i=0 , j=s.length()-1 ; i<=j ; i++ , j--){
				
				temp = s[i] ;
				s[i] = s[j] ;
				s[j] = temp ;
			
			}

			cout << s << endl ;
		}
	}

}
